0: Network-wide ads & trackers blocking DNS server
Easily automate tasks across different services
Request management and media discovery tool

# renovate: github-release depName=WDaan/VueTorrent
VUETORRENT_VERSION="v2.8.0"
rm -rf /data/config/vuetorrent
busybox wget -qO- "https://github.com/WDaan/VueTorrent/releases/download/$${VUETORRENT_VERSION}/vuetorrent.zip" | busybox unzip -d /data/config -
dnf install -y chrony iputils dnsutils && chronyd -n -d

[ups-1]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  # pollinterval = 15
  desc = "APC Back-UPS Pro 1500"
  # vendorid = "051D"
  # productid = "0002"
  product = "Back-UPS RS 1500G FW:865.L9 .D USB FW:L9"
  serial = "4B2107P01305"
  # vendor = "American Power Conversion"
  # bus = "001"
# [ups-2]
#   driver = snmp-ups
#   privProtocol=AES
#   port = 192.168.3.82
#   desc = "APC Smart-UPS 750"
# [ups-3]
#   driver = snmp-ups
#   privProtocol=AES
#   port = 192.168.3.83
#   desc = "APC Smart-UPS 750"

[admin]
  password = secret
  actions = SET
  instcmds = ALL
  upsmon master
[upsmon]
  password = secret
  upsmon slave

MONITOR ups-1@localhost 1 admin secret master
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15
